text: allah tama dayava magin ovunta laba dun vastungen kavurun masurukam dakvannoda ovun, eya ovunta hondak yayi nositiya yutuya. eya ovunta napurak bavatama avasan vanu æta. ovun masurukama magin ekkasu (kara tæbu) vastun viniscaya dinadi ovunge khellehi malayak vasayen patalava harinu læbe. ahas ha bhumiyehi urumakkara ayitiya allahtama ayatya. allah oba karana dæ siyalla hondin danneku vasayenma sitinneya
